name: PATIENT_HPI_INFO
description: This table is for history of present illness information that is captured for the patient within the visit info section.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: HPI_HRV_ID
columns.description: Stores the reason for visit ID for the related HPI information.

columns.name: HPI_ELEM_ID
columns.description: Stores the HPI Data Element associated with the HPI information.

columns.name: HPI_PROMPT
columns.description: Stores the prompt for multiple response HPI elements related to the HPI information.

columns.name: HPI_VALUE
columns.description: Stores the data values for a response to an HPI element.

columns.name: HPI_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the comment related to a history of present illness (HPI) finding.

columns.name: HPI_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who entered the most recent HPI information.

columns.name: HPI_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: HPI_UPDATED_IN_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of entry for the most recent HPI information.
